org.agilewiki.jactor2.modules.pubSub

Class RequestBus<CONTENT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • NonBlockingBladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.modules.pubSub.RequestBus<CONTENT>
  • Type Parameters:
    CONTENT - The type of content.

    public class RequestBus<CONTENT>
extends NonBlockingBladeBase
    A blade that publishes content to interested subscribers, using either signals or sends.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RequestBus() 
      RequestBus(NonBlockingReactor _reactor) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <any> sendsContentAReq(CONTENT _content)
      Returns a request to send some content to all the interested subscribers.
      <any> signalsContentSReq(CONTENT _content)
      Returns a request to send some content to all the interested subscribers without waiting for those subscribers to process the content.
